predicate: The bwp-id in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config must match the bwp-id in csi-im-resourcesforinterference.

valid: bwp-id in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config = 3, bwp-id in csi-im-resourcesforinterference = 3
invalid: bwp-id in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config = 2, bwp-id in csi-im-resourcesforinterference = 3

notes: The evidence suggests a matching requirement between bwp-id fields across the two IEs.
